name: Project Rampage VR
description: Big meets bigger in Project Rampage VR, the official virtual reality game for the movie Rampage starring Dwayne Johnson - in theaters April 20! Using CRISPR technology, create monster mutations in Energyne’s lab and unleash destruction across the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 / AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
